mapper.insert: INSERT INTO User (user_id, password, email, name, register_date, phone, address, company) VALUES ( #{userCode}, #{password}, #{email}, #{name}, now(), #{phone, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{address, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{company, jdbcType=NVARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM User where upper(user_id) = upper(#{param1})
SELECT user_id, password, email, name, register_date, phone, address, company FROM User WHERE user_id = #{param1}
mapper.update: UPDATE User SET password = #{password}, email = #{email}, name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, address = #{address}, company = #{company} WHERE user_id = #{userCode}
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, email, name, register_date, phone, address, company, #{param1} as token FROM User where user_id = (select user_id from Token where token_id = #{param1})

SELECT distinct a.user_id, a.email, a.name, a.register_date, a.phone, a.address, a.company FROM User a left join UserClientScope b on a.user_id = b.user_id where 1=1 and a.user_id != 'admin' and (b.client_id in (select aa.client_id from UserClientScope aa join Token bb on aa.user_id = bb.user_id where bb.token_id= #{adminToken} and aa.scope_id = 'Admin' and aa.client_id != 'gauth') or exists (select 1 from Token aaa where aaa.token_id = #{adminToken} and aaa.user_id = 'admin'))
and (a.user_id = #{search} or a.email = #{search} or a.company = #{search} or a.name = #{search})
limit ${p}, 20
select email , status , activate_key , expire_date , client_id from Pending where activate_key = #{activateKey}
select email , status , activate_key , expire_date , client_id from Pending where email = #{param1} order by expire_date desc limit 1
select (select count(*) from User where email = #{param1}) + (select count(*) from Pending where email = #{param1} and expire_date >= now()) as count

select count(distinct 1) from User a left join UserClientScope b on a.user_id = b.user_id where 1=1 and a.user_id != 'admin' and (b.client_id in (select aa.client_id from UserClientScope aa join Token bb on aa.user_id = bb.user_id where bb.token_id= #{adminToken} and aa.scope_id = 'Admin' and aa.client_id != 'gauth') or exists (select 1 from Token aaa where aaa.token_id = #{adminToken} and aaa.user_id = 'admin'))
and (a.user_id = #{search} or a.email = #{search} or a.company = #{search} or a.name = #{search})

select email , activate_key , status , expire_date , client_id from Pending where (client_id in (select aa.client_id from UserClientScope aa join Token bb on aa.user_id = bb.user_id where bb.token_id= #{tokenId} and aa.scope_id = 'Admin' and aa.client_id != 'gauth') or exists (select 1 from Token aaa where aaa.token_id = #{tokenId} and aaa.user_id = 'admin')) order by expire_date
